siteMetadata.title: Typesetting Blog
siteMetadata.description: A starter blog demonstrating what Gatsby can do.

node.excerpt:
Today I found in the workshop a some cases with «Elementarschmuck»
 Patterns for security prints
 And a case with all the same patern
 Some…

CNC If you produce your own wood type. It’s best to take pear wood («Stirnholz»)  .
I also saw good examples made with «Filmbeschichtete…
Colors To print in take «Kleinoffset ohne Trockenstoff». As for Black you can probably also order «Folienfarbe». Colos in Switzerland…
